etymology.description: Depicts a tree 木 (mù, "tree") with thorns
etymology.interpretation: The character 朿(朿) (cì, "thorn") is a pictogram that visually represents the image of a tree with thorns. This depiction highlights the primary feature of thorns protruding from a branch or tree, emphasizing their pointed and sharp nature.

examples.chinese: 玫瑰上的朿非常锋利(玫瑰上的朿非常鋒利)。
examples.pinyin: Méiguī shàng de cì fēicháng fēnglì.
examples.english: The thorn on the rose is very sharp.

examples.chinese: 树枝上生长着小小的朿(樹枝上生長著小小的朿)，保护着嫩绿的叶子(保護著嫩綠的葉子)。
examples.pinyin: Shùzhī shàng shēngzhǎng zhe xiǎoxiǎo de cì, bǎohù zhe nènlǜ de yèzi.
examples.english: Small thorns grow on the branches, protecting the tender green leaves.
